page.title: 12 IDEAS FOR THE FUTURE
page.content: In our area ninety three per cent of people like where they live.Thirty per cent of people think that there should be more facilities for children.Fifteen per cent would like more sports facilities.Ten per cent wanted a community centre,some more shops and better roads.Thirteen per cent of people would not like any more building and ten per cent even said they could not think of a way to improve the area where they live. Only seven per cent do not like the area they live in. It is estimated that there are about one thousand children living in this survey area.The only facilities available to them are two small parks, and clubs and societies held in school buildings. All children surveyed said that the facilities should be improved.
